alert.note: Alert for Frenchman Basin; Niobrara Valley, Fort Niobrara NWR, Samuel R McKelvie National Forest; Sandhills, Valentine NWR, Nebraska National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 22 at 3:08PM CDT until October 22 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND VERY LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 206 AND 208... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM CDT SUNDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND VERY LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 206 AND 208... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a new Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 7 PM CDT Sunday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 206 Sandhills/Valentine NWR/Nebraska National Forest and Fire Weather Zone 208 Niobrara Valley/Fort Niobrara NWR/Samuel R McKelvie National Forest. * TIMING...Saturday Noon to 8 PM CDT, Sunday Noon to 7 PM CDT. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Near 10 percent today, near 19 percent Sunday. * TEMPERATURES...Highs in the lower to mid 80s. * LIGHTNING...Not anticipated. * IMPACTS...Any fire start will likely spread rapidly and be very difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Frenchman Basin; Niobrara Valley, Fort Niobrara NWR, Samuel R McKelvie National Forest; Sandhills, Valentine NWR, Nebraska National Forest
